title: 5-day rally halts! L&T Finance down 7% on profit-taking post L&T stake hike - Business Standard
content: 5-day rally halts! L&T Finance down 7% on profit-taking post L&T stake hike  Business Standard
description: On Wednesday, the stock ended 18 per cent higher after L&T bought 41.49 million equity shares of L&T Finance Holdings for Rs 348 crore.
